section-2-discipline_appointment_key2: BOG DISCO ke appointment ke liye nomination mangega. Students khud ya kisi aur ko bhi nominate kar sakte hain. Board of Governors ke ek ya ek se jyada members interview ke basis par DISCO ka appointment karenge.
section-2-discipline_appointment_key3: DISCO ki profile ke liye nomination is form ke through liye jayenge.
section-2-discipline_appointment_key5: Kisi student ke rules violate karne ya misbehave karne par DISCO BOG ke saath consult karke disciplinary action le sakta hai.
